About Us

Innovating Science and Delivery Technologies

Our Mission

Altanine is a pharmaceutical company advancing medicines to bring meaningful improvement to patients' lives through innovative science and delivery technologies.

Our Advantage

Strategically poised for both immediate and long-term success.

01

Revenue-generating platform of existing product offerings

Ability to sell diabetes, weight-loss, migraine and erectile disfunction drugs with our technology through 503a compounding pharmacies. Significant IP library covering 400 drug families.

02

Potential for FDA generic approval in or prior to 2027

Clear pathway for abbreviated FDA generic approval for existing, core products. Longer term clinical opportunities for inhalable versions of in-demand drugs.

03

Strong Pipeline for new drug development

Opportunity to commercialize or license additional products including CBD, psychedelics and other applications of our coating technology.

Featured Product

How diabetes is treated today

Metformin

This is the most commonly prescribed medication for Type 2 diabetes, likely used by about 60-70% of patients, especially as a first-line treatment.

Our Mission

Our core values.

Innovation:

We prioritize research and development to create products that offer unique benefits, such as reduced side effects and improved ease of use, setting us apart from generic Metformin manufacturers.

Safety and Efficacy:

Our commitment to producing drugs that are both safe and highly effective is at the core of everything we do. We strive to exceed the industry standards and ensure our customers receive the best possible treatment options.

Customer-Centricity:

Understanding the needs and challenges of our customers is fundamental. We aim to build trust and confidence among our customers by providing them with superior drug options that improve their quality of life, making us their preferred choice for diabetes treatment.
